title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.1, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for integrating Ollama models into Python apps with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to talk to Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as a local LLM provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama with OpenAI look-and-feel, file upload, RAG, multi-user, etc.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama providing sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration to use Ollama models in production-grade RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-use Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama with WebUI, Open-WebUI, or LibreChat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain in 50 lines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into your server with slash commands.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package and NixOS module for Ollama with automatic GPU driver configuration.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP library for Ollama with GenServer-backed connection pooling and LiveView hooks.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated collection of custom Modelfiles for code, multilingual, and role-play use cases.

title: ollama-rfcs
summary: Public RFC repo tracking upcoming Ollama features like multi-modal, function calling, and auth.
